averageWorkingHours: Working weeks count and average hours per working week
disclaimerText: The Contractor shall only be liable for damages to the Client if they are based on grossly negligent or intentional behaviour or on the breach of a material contractual obligation. In the event of a slightly negligent breach of a material contractual obligation, the amount of liability shall be limited to the foreseeable, typically occurring damage at the start of the contract. Liability for loss of profit, third-party claims, lost savings, data acquisition and processing costs is excluded. Claims for injury to life, limb or health or under the Product Liability Act remain unaffected by the above limitations of liability.

Hello,

the invoice for my work in the project ":Title" is attached.

Thank you for the cooperation and best regards

formLabels.rsc26: Goods, raw materials and auxiliary materials

hidePositionsDate: Hide date of positions in invoice.
inquiries: Thank you for your interest and I look forward to working with you! Please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions.
invoice.explanation: Thank you for your cooperation and trust. The total amount of :Gross is to be transferred to the bank account mentioned below within 14 days from receipt of this invoice, quoting the invoice number :Number. Please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions.
invoice.onlyTransitory: This invoice only contains transitory items.
invoicingText: One person day comprises 8 hours. Billing is based on the actual hours worked. The billing cycle is 15 minutes. Unless otherwise agreed, hours worked within a calendar month will be invoiced at the beginning of the following month. Proof of the services provided will be attached to the invoice. The invoice amount is due within 14 days of receipt of the invoice.
name: Name
referenceUseText: The Contractor is authorised to name the Client in text (in particular company name) and image (in particular company logo) as a reference customer in a reference list or press release.
servicePeriodText: The service is expected to be provided in the period from {0} to {1}. Delays in the project may occur in particular if the scope of the project changes on the basis of new requirements. The Contractor hereby assures that orders from other clients will also be processed during this period.
